data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Banaadir, Somalia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Banaadir, Somalia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Banaadir prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7051 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Banaadir, Somalia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Banaadir, Somalia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tunni people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Banaadir, Somalia that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Banaadir, Somalia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 234 believers in Banaadir to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,649,766 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Banaadir
location.people_groups_list: Mahra, Rahanweyn, Deaf, Arab, Yemeni, Arab
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mahra (4,200), Rahanweyn (2,016,000), Deaf (159,000), Arab, Yemeni (21,000), Arab (6,300)
